export const lightTheme = {
  body: '#E2E2E2',
  text: '#363537',
  toggleBorder: '#FFF',
  gradient: 'linear-gradient(#39598A, #79D7ED)',
  menuLinkBorder: ' 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,.3)',
  menuLinkShadow: '4px 4px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1), -4px -4px 6px rgba(255,255,255,1)',
  menuBG: 'linear-gradient(145deg, #ffffff, #d6dce6)',
  menuShadow: '9px 9px 17px #d6dce6, -9px -9px 17px #ffffff',
  menuLinkColor: 'dimgray',
  hoverLinkShadow: '4px 4px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1), -4px -4px 10px rgba(255,255,255,1)'
};
export const darkTheme = {
  body: '#363537',
  text: '#FAFAFA',
  toggleBorder: '#6B8096',
  gradient: 'linear-gradient(#091236, #1E215D)',
  menuLinkBorder: ' 2px solid rgba(0,0,0,.3)',
  menuLinkShadow: '4px 4px 6px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.1), -4px -4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
  menuBG: 'linear-gradient(145deg, #313032, #3a393b);',
  menuShadow: '20px 20px 41px #2e2d2f, -20px -20px 41px #3e3d3f',
  menuLinkColor: 'lightgray',
  hoverLinkShadow: ''
};

sourcesContent:
export const lightTheme = {
    body: '#E2E2E2',
    text: '#363537',
    toggleBorder: '#FFF',
    gradient: 'linear-gradient(#39598A, #79D7ED)',
    menuLinkBorder : ' 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,.3)',
    menuLinkShadow : '4px 4px 6px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1), -4px -4px 6px rgba(255,255,255,1)',
    menuBG: 'linear-gradient(145deg, #ffffff, #d6dce6)',
    menuShadow : '9px 9px 17px #d6dce6, -9px -9px 17px #ffffff',
    menuLinkColor: 'dimgray',
    hoverLinkShadow : '4px 4px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1), -4px -4px 10px rgba(255,255,255,1)'
  }
  
  export const darkTheme = {
    body: '#363537',
    text: '#FAFAFA',
    toggleBorder: '#6B8096',
    gradient: 'linear-gradient(#091236, #1E215D)',
    menuLinkBorder : ' 2px solid rgba(0,0,0,.3)',
    menuLinkShadow : '4px 4px 6px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.1), -4px -4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,1)',
    menuBG: 'linear-gradient(145deg, #313032, #3a393b);',
    menuShadow : '20px 20px 41px #2e2d2f, -20px -20px 41px #3e3d3f',
    menuLinkColor: 'lightgray',
    hoverLinkShadow : ''
  }
